content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with Box 13 this week. We’ll hear The Treasure Of Hang Li, which aired sometime on 1948.

(27:07) Our second story comes from Pat Novak For Hire. From November 23, 1947, here’s The Lydia Reynolds Case.
